players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Charlie is suspicious, I think he might be the detective."
Charlie: "I will continue to investigate and gather more information. I won't reveal my role as the detective just yet."
You: "I think Bob is the mafioso, I want to lynch him."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob

memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
